settings.answer_1: When you order one nanofilm, you get a one-digit sticker. You can add the necessary symbols to the cart on website.
settings.question_2: What happens if the nanofilm is scratched?
settings.answer_2: It is quite difficult to damage the Ecoslick® sticker because it is attached very firmly, forming an almost inseparable bond with the license plate. Even if there are scratches, it will be very difficult for the speed camera to determine which symbol is covered.
settings.question_3: What happens to the nanofilm after washing?
settings.answer_3: Ecoslick nanofilm is not afraid of washing, any type of car wash. The film is almost impossible to tear off with water pressure. Therefore, be extremely careful and precise when gluing.
settings.question_4: Is it necessary to put a film on the rear license plate of a car?
settings.answer_4: Depending on the terrain, speed cameras may be located in two directions and will record your car from both sides. We recommend gluing the film on both sides.
settings.question_6: How many symbols are best covered with film?
settings.answer_6: The more symbols are hidden under the nanofilm, the less opportunities there are to decipher the number from the camera recording. It is recommended to cover all front and back license plates symbols.
settings.answer_7: Ecoslick® film is designed for many years of use, since it is created from durable, wear-resistant materials designed to withstand difficult weather conditions, temperature changes and varying degrees of mechanical impact. The warranty period is 5 years.
settings.question_8: What is the difference between an infrared flash and a camera flash?
settings.answer_8: Infrared light is highly focused rays that are invisible to the human eye and are different from the bright flash of a camera. It is in the infrared spectrum that automatic speed cameras operate. It is against this spectrum that Ecoslick® film acts.
settings.question_9: What does the camera see when using nanofilm?
settings.answer_9: The camera only sees the illuminated area where the symbols are hidden under the Ecoslick® stickers, which blends into the white background. Accordingly, the digital system does not recognize the number and does not record it in the database of traffic violations. There is no one to give a fine!
settings.question_10: Does nanofilm work during the day?
settings.answer_10: The infrared beams of speed cameras work both day and night.
settings.question_11: Why should I buy your product?
settings.answer_11: Our Ecoslick® nanofilm is manufactured in Germany and is therefore reliable and effective. All numbers and symbols comply with the national standards of each country. On the market you can find offers with a suspiciously low price - accordingly, such a film will not protect you from the eyes of a traffic cop or simply will not fit the size of your license plate.
settings.answer_12: Apply the sticker carefully — it bonds instantly and can't be repositioned. You can see visual instructions on our set up page.

settings.answer_1: When ordering one nano-film, you receive a piece of material from which you can cut out the letters you need on your own.

settings.answer_5: Cut the piece of the material and stick it on the corresponding symbol on the license plate. Then cut around the outline of the symbol. Cut slowly and do not press the blade too hard to avoid damaging the license plate. Gently remove the exess of material and it's done!

settings.question_1: What versions of the Alite Blackout License Plate Hider are available?
settings.answer_1:
We offer multiple versions of the Alite Blackout, designed to accommodate both USA and European license plate sizes.
USA Versions:
- Alite Blackout License Plate Hider - for 1 license plate (US version)
- Alite Blackout License Plate Hider - for 2 license plates (US version)
European Versions:
- Alite Blackout License Plate Hider - for 1 license plate (EU version)
- Alite Blackout License Plate Hider - for 2 license plates (EU version)
Each version ensures a perfect fit for its designated region, providing a seamless and discreet look.
settings.question_3: What is included in the Alite Blackout kit?
settings.answer_3:
Each kit contains:
- One or two Alite Blackout frames (depending on the selected version).
- Mounting hardware for secure installation.
- Electrical cables required for installation.
- Installation manual for easy setup.
settings.question_4: How does the Alite Blackout work?
settings.answer_4: When activated, the mechanism obscures the license plate, reducing its visibility to cameras. It is designed for controlled use and provides a discreet, seamless effect.
settings.question_5: Can the frames be visually distinguished from regular license plate holders?
settings.answer_5: No, the Alite Blackout is designed to be discreet. It looks like a standard license plate holder when not activated.
settings.question_6: Will the plate fold back due to wind or force?
settings.answer_6: No, the mechanism is built to withstand wind pressure and external force. It remains secure even during high-speed driving or attempts to manipulate it.
settings.question_7: What happens if the remote control is lost?
settings.answer_7: Each kit includes two remote controls for convenience. If both are lost, you may need to contact customer support for replacement.
settings.question_8: Can I use the Alite Blackout in extreme weather conditions?
settings.answer_8: Yes, the Alite Blackout is made with durable materials to withstand various weather conditions, including rain, snow, and heat.
settings.question_9: How do I install Alite Blackout?
settings.answer_9: Mount the frame, connect the power, and use the remote to activate blackout mode — you can read the full instructions set up page.

settings.question_1: What versions of the Alite Flipper+ license plate frames are available?
settings.answer_1:
We offer two versions:
- A hard traction mechanism for the front plate.
- A 1-meter cable version for the rear plate.
Additionally, you can purchase a bundle that includes frames for both plates.
settings.question_2: What is included in the Alite Flipper+ kit?
settings.answer_2:
The kit includes:
- One or two frames (depending on the selected bundle).
- A remote control unit.
- Two remote controls.
*Note: Electric cables for installing the frames are not included in the kit.*
settings.question_3: How does the Alite Flipper+ work?
settings.answer_3: When you press the button on the remote, the mechanism folds the license plate downward by 90 degrees, making it face the ground. This prevents cameras from reading the plate.
settings.question_4: Can the frames be visually distinguished from regular license plate holders?
settings.answer_4: No. The Alite Flipper+ is designed to be discreet, with all mechanisms and construction hidden within the car body. It looks like a standard license plate holder.
settings.question_5: Will the plate fold back due to wind or force?
settings.answer_5: No. The mechanism is designed to resist wind pressure and cannot be folded back by external force. It remains secure during fast driving or under physical attempts to manipulate it.
settings.question_6: What happens if the remote control is lost?
settings.answer_6: Each kit includes two remote controls for convenience. If both are lost, you may need to contact customer support for replacement.
settings.question_7: Can I use the Alite Flipper+ in extreme weather conditions?
settings.answer_7: Yes, the Alite Flipper+ is built with durable materials designed to withstand various weather conditions, including rain, snow, and heat.
settings.question_8: How do I install Alite Flipper+?
settings.answer_8: Attach the frame using screws, then use the remote to fold the plate when needed — you can read the full instructions set up page.

settings.answer_1: Alite Nanotape is a frameless license plate mounting system that uses high-strength Velcro and 3M adhesive to securely attach your plate without screws or drilling.
settings.question_2: What versions of the Alite Nanotape License Plate Holder are available?
settings.answer_2: There are two versions: one sized for EU plates and one for US plates, ensuring a perfect fit.
settings.question_3: Will it hold my plate securely?
settings.answer_3: The 3M adhesive and Velcro system can hold up to 50 kg, providing a rock-solid grip in all conditions.
settings.question_4: Can I remove and reattach my license plate easily?
settings.answer_4: The Velcro-based system allows for quick removal and reattachment whenever needed, without losing its strength.
settings.question_5: Won't it peel off in the rain?
settings.answer_5: Alite Nanotape is weatherproof, heat-resistant, and durable, ensuring a firm hold in rain, snow, and high temperatures
settings.question_6: Does it damage the car or license plate?
settings.answer_6: Each kit includes two remote controls for convenience. If both are lost, you may need to contact customer support for replacement.
settings.question_7: How long does the adhesive last?
settings.answer_7: The 3M adhesive is designed for long-term durability, providing a strong bond for years without weakening.
settings.question_8: How do I install Alite Nanotape?
settings.answer_8: Clean the surface, stick the nanotape, and press the plate firmly — you can read the full instructions set up page.
